docs.text: This is a WIP site and contains the project documentation for the django-scaffold.

docs.title: Table of Contents
docs.text:
The documentation follows the best practice for project documentation as described in the Diátaxis documentation framework and consists of four separate parts:

  1. Tutorials
  2. How-To Guides
  3. Reference
  4. Explanation

docs.title: main()
docs.text:
Run administrative tasks.

Source code in app/manage.py 
def main():
    """Run administrative tasks."""
    os.environ.setdefault("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE", "project.settings")
    try:
        from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line
    except ImportError as exc:
        raise ImportError(
            "Couldn't import Django. Are you sure it's installed and "
            "available on your PYTHONPATH environment variable? Did you "
            "forget to activate a virtual environment?"
        ) from exc
    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)
